snippet: Joaquim Rodríguez stayed close to Alberto Contador’s back wheel with every surge by his fellow Spaniard to the finish line at the Lagos de Covadonga summit in the Vuelta a España.
abstract: Spanish cyclist Antonio Piedra wins the 15th stage of the Vuelta a Espana, while his countryman Joaquim Rodriguez maintains overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Joaquim Rodríguez stayed close to Alberto Contador’s back wheel with every surge by his fellow Spaniard to the finish line at the Lagos de Covadonga summit in the Vuelta a España.
